lines.text: The men you posted are coming into town.
I thank you for warning me, but I've already heard.
Why does it have to happen? Why do these things always have to end in bloodshed?
Ah, that's how things are, Miss Jessie. That's why I was hired... why you hired me.
And so they'll come into town, and you'll shoot them all down dog-dead in the street, is that it?
